markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Air Bubble](/Spells.aspx?ID=5)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 316 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** A creature within range enters an environment where it can't breathe.

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** the triggering creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

A bubble of pure air appears around the target's head, allowing it to breathe normally. The effect ends as soon as the target returns to an environment where it can breathe normally.
name: Air Bubble

React to create air for a creature to breathe.
</summary>
